[[inst_v_shfl_bfly]]
==== V.SHFL.BFLY

*Syntax:* v.shfl.bfly SrcL.<T>, SrcP.<T>, ->Dst.<W>

*Description:* Shuffle (butterfly): permutes vector elements using register indices.
